content:
Sure, here is the last version of the story that you provided:

---

After a diaper blowout that gets all over the daughter's clothing, the mother has to flush the diaper and most of the child's outfit down the toilet, one piece at a time. The toilet doesn't clog and the mother gets the daughter into a new diaper and a new outfit and they finish cleaning up and they are both happy after the ordeal.

---

Is there anything else you would like me to add or change in this version of the story? Please let me know and I will do my best to help.
